compliant.section: 我們可能隨我們的服務及隱私權實務的改變，或相關法律或規範之要求不定期更新本「隱私權政策」。於可行之情況下，我們將以電子郵件通知您任何重大的變更。我們會將最新更新內容公開於下方，我們鼓勵您定期檢視本「隱私權政策」以了解我們使用您個人資訊的方式。
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with the following information: ... (f) the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority;

compliant.section: 我們的網站會使用 Cookie 來增強使用者體驗、提供個人化內容、監控網站使用情況並投放廣告。按一下「全部接受」即表示您同意在您的瀏覽器儲存 Cookie，或者按一下「管理偏好」來自訂您的個人偏好。如需了解更多，請閱讀 ATEN 隱私權政策 及 Cookie 政策。
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to withdraw his or her consent at any time.  The withdrawal of consent shall not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

non_compliant.section: 上次更新日期：2023 年 6 月
non_compliant.legal provisions: identity and the contact details of the controller and, where applicable, of the controller's representative
non_compliant.amend: Add the name and contact details of the data controller, as well as the data controller's representative if applicable.

non_compliant.section: © 2024 ATEN INTERNATIONAL Co., Ltd. 保留所有權利。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child.
non_compliant.amend: Translate the copyright notice into the language of the privacy policy.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child.
